newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Crendell details terms of rights offer.
newsitem.headline: Crendell details terms of rights offer.

text.p: Crendell Investment Corp Ltd said on Thursday shareholders would be offered new Crendell shares in the ratio of 1,225 shares for every 100 held in terms of its rights offer.
The issue price of the offer, which opens on Friday, will be 18 cents a share, the company said in a statement.
The offer will raise 51 million rand before expenses.
Crendell, which is currently only a cash shell, will be the vehicle whereby entertainment and communications firm Sasani Ltd will list on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
Sasani will buy a 73.08 percent stake in Crendell.
